body_html:
This change has broader implications, e.g. this line in RNN: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py#L114

output.append(isinstance(hidden, tuple) and hidden[0] or hidden)

now raises the exception and it should be fixed to

output.append(hidden[0] if isinstance(hidden, tuple) else hidden)

Tomorrow.

Tomorrow.
body:
This change has broader implications, e.g. this line in RNN: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py#L114
```
output.append(isinstance(hidden, tuple) and hidden[0] or hidden)
```
now raises the exception and it should be fixed to
```
output.append(hidden[0] if isinstance(hidden, tuple) else hidden)
```
Tomorrow.
